# Outfit Matcher Project

This is a full-stack application that helps users manage their wardrobe and get intelligent outfit suggestions based on various factors including weather, occasion, and style preferences.

## Project Structure

The project is organized into the following main components:

- `server/`: Node.js/Express backend
- `web/`: React web application
- `mobile/`: React Native mobile application
- `shared/`: Shared types and utilities
- `ai/`: AI processing and ML models
- `database/`: Database schemas and migrations

## Development Guidelines

- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Use async/await for asynchronous operations
- Implement proper error handling
- Write unit tests for critical components
- Document API endpoints using OpenAPI/Swagger
- Follow security best practices for handling user data
- Use environment variables for sensitive configuration

## Main Features

- Wardrobe management
- AI-powered outfit suggestions
- Weather integration
- Occasion-based matching
- Style learning system
- Image processing and analysis
- User authentication and authorization
- Data privacy and security
